 Generic SPAM Data Types and Defines

 PID Controller Functions
 

This modules provides a PID Controller and an average speed function.


Detailed Description

This is the BROFist Client to upload on a SPAM unit.

It receives the Operations requested, behaves accordingly and then sends the response data back to the Server. It also has a PID Controller that can make the Servo Motors rotate at a certain speed.
